title: #1556 I'm So Glad I'm Not a Pussy!
itunes:title: #1556 I'm So Glad I'm Not a Pussy!
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show by going to the phones and speaking with a caller who has a Karl Marx quote that he wants to get Drew & Adam's reaction to. They also review Adam's December 2020 appearance on 'The Doctors' to take a look at how Adam's hard line stance and provocative tweets from that time have aged. They also speak with a caller who has a family member struggling with drug abuse and finally a fan who wants their thoughts on Deshaun Watson's legal situation. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
Babbel.com/ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
Geico.com
Pluto.TV
